Name: 鬼山 / A Ghost Around Me
About the game: 'The mountain is like a huge secret room. On the mountain, no matter what happens, only the mountain knows.' Operation Tip: Long press the left mouse button to fast forward Tips: The plot contains some horror pictures, you can select [Care for the timid mode] in [Title Page]-[Switch Mode] In this mode, before there is a plot that may cause discomfort, a reminder will pop up, so that the little friend can be mentally prepared in advance. At the same time, it will also reduce the sense of substitution. Please choose according to your own situation~ In the fall of a certain year, there was a sensational incident. All the students in a class of high school and high school, as well as teachers and drivers, were collectively missing on the way to the autumn tour. The search and rescue team rummaged through the whole mountain and found no clues. Seven days after the incident, only a few survivors returned. When interviewing survivors, the other person’s face is only fear, and the words are fragmented. 'There is...here...'
